mapper.select: SELECT no, title, author, content, regdate, updateday FROM board INNER JOIN tbl_member_auth auth ON mem.userid = auth.userid WHERE mem.userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(id, password, name, nickname, phone, address, level, regdate) VALUES( #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{level}, sysdate() )
